title: Pixel phone not recognizing SIM
content:
I just got a new Pixel 3 phone and it will not recognise the SIM card. I have tried installing all updates, a different SIM, and restarting the phone all to no avail. My SIM works in all other phones that I have, but not the Pixel.

Please help
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
